Title: Sparks of Life: The Forbidden Reach
Description:
The Forbidden Reach is enveloped with the vibrancy of the Dragon Isles.

Go explore and capture sparks, but stay wary for any combatants you may encounter.
ObjectivesText: Collect 50 Sparks of Life in The Forbidden Reach, while in War Mode.
ObjectivesCompletionText: Speak with Fieldmaster Emberath in Valdrakken.
